news.content:
ðŸ“° ThreeFold Weekly! February 7th Edition (Volume Five)


Letâ€™s take a look at some of the most important happenings in the ThreeFold universe from last week â€“ grid migration, ownCloud powered by ThreeFold, momentum for TFT, validator node registrations (limited spots remain!), and more!


https://forum.threefold.io/t/threefold-weekly-february-7th-edition-volume-five/2099


You can find all earlier editions of ThreeFold Weekly here.
news.excerpt: Some of the most important happenings in the ThreeFold universe last week!
